name: Money page DARK THEME (Roblox)
description:
If you are an active user of the summary/transaction pages, you are probably annoyed by the absence of the dark theme. However, with the release of this style, you will never feel this pain again, as the dark theme is introduced into this old, un-updated page - with the fluency of any other ROBLOX page.

Other nice touches have been added too - for example, the ROBLOX branding has been updated from the red logo to the white logo (since ROBLOX wont do this themselves ðŸ˜‰)
